T11bsa0551u:6: asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ vāhya meva vivakṣitaṃ;
T11bsa0551u:8: yadi vā apohanaṃ apoha ityanya vyāvṛttimātraṃ iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
T11bsa0551u:12: tathāhi parvvatoddeśe vanhirastīti śābdau pratītirvvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate;
T11bsa0551u:14: yacca pratyakṣavādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśa ityatiprasiddham /
T11bsa0551u:15: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:18: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve 'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇāt vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām;
T11bsa0551u:22: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve 'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt,
T11bsa0551u:24: anyathāsati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākārepi cetasi turagabodha ityastu /
T11bsa0551u:26: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśā kārovikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu,
T11bsa0551u:28: tadā ca satopi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt;
T11bsa0551u:41: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam;
T11bsa0551u:42: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyāt anyāpoḍhovadhāryyate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam /
T11bsa0551u:45: na hi vidhiṃ pratīpadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati;
T11bsa0551u:51: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpala pratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryyam;
T11bsa0551u:52: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt ago[']pohasphuraṇamanivāryyam /
T11bsa0551u:56: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ;
T11bsa0551u:62: tāsāñca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityarthatastadavagaterna gāmbadhāneti co dito 'śvādīn badhnāti /
T11bsa0551u:63: tadapyanenaiva nirastaṃ yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe 'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyavyāvṛttameva cet,
T11bsa0551u:67: vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthatopi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam /
T11bsa0551u:73: na hi sāmānyaṃ nāma sāmānyamātramabhipretam turagepi gośabdasaṅketaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa0551u:78: tasmāt ekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvvako yaḥ sarvvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiradhya sto vikalpabudhyākāraḥ,
T11bsa0551u:86: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva;
T11bsa0551u:90: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthāeveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt tasmādapohadharmmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ;
T11bsa0551u:105: indriyaśabdasvabhāvopāyabhedāt ekasyaiva pratibhāsa bheda iti cet?
T11bsa0551u:109: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruḍdhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ;
T11bsa0551u:115: dūrāsannadeśavarttinoḥ puruṣayoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhedepi na śākhibheda iti cet?
T11bsa0551u:118: tato yatrārthakriyābhedādisacivaḥ pratibhāsabhedaḥ tatra vastubhedaḥ, ghaṭavat /
T11bsa0551u:121: na ca śabdapratyakṣayovvastugocaratve pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteriti /
T11bsa0551u:125: tanna śābde pratyaye svalakṣaṇam parisphurati kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvvātmanā pratipatteḥ,
T11bsa0551u:131: tasmāt śabdapratibhāsasya vāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate /
T11bsa0551u:132: yacca vācaspatinā jātimabdyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastu tyānanantarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate;
T11bsa0551u:133: sā hi svarūpato nityāpi deśakālaviprakīrṇānekavyaktyāśrayatayā bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇībhavannastinā stisambandhayogyā;
T11bsa0551u:137: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇāvācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt /
T11bsa0551u:151: yacceḍhaṃ na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāṃ arthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt;
T11bsa0551u:153: bhinnāvabhāsadūṣaṇena dūṣitam vicitraśaktitvañca pramāṇānāṃ sākṣātkārādhyavasāyābhyāmapi caritārtham /
T11bsa0551u:154: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt;
T11bsa0551u:156: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet?
T11bsa0551u:161: vikalpastu svayanniścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa?
T11bsa0551u:162: asti ca śabdaliṅgāntarāpekṣā tato na vastu svarūpagrahaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:163: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmmadvāreṇa
T11bsa0551u:164: pratītepi śākhini dharmmāntaravattayā na pratītiriti kinna bhinnā bhidhānādhī no
T11bsa0551u:168: dṛśyasya dharmmadharmmibhedasya pratyakṣapratikṣiptatvā danyathā sarvvaṃ sarvvatra syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:173: tathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādi sambandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmmipratipattau niravaśeṣataḍvarmmapratipatti rbhavet;
T11bsa0551u:179: natūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti /
T11bsa0551u:183: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmmadharmmiṇoḥ pratiniyamakalpanamucitam /
T11bsa0551u:187: tadabhiprāyānavagāhana phalam tathā hi tvanmate dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedaḥ upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattiḥ /
T11bsa0551u:189: tat kathaṃ sūryyo pakāryyasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
T11bsa0551u:192: asti ca, tasmānna svalakṣaṇasya śabdavikalpaliṅgapratibhāsitvamiti sthitam //
T11bsa0551u:194: saritaḥ pāre gāvaścarantīti gavādiśabdāt sāsrāśṛṅgalāṅgūlādayo 'kṣarākāraparikaritāḥ sajātīyabhedāparāmarśanāt sampiṇḍitaprāyāḥ pratibhāsante
T11bsa0551u:201: vyaktaya eva vā sajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantā manubhavavyavadhānāt;
T11bsa0551u:212: yadāpi piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet;
T11bsa0551u:216: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvam syāt /
T11bsa0551u:217: tasmāt kāraṇaparamparāta eva gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā /
T11bsa0551u:220: atha bhinnaṃ tadā tadeva sāmānyam nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet?
T11bsa0551u:222: yathātvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ tatha anyopi bhavan kīdṛśandoṣamāvahati?
T11bsa0551u:223: yathā bhavatāṃ jātirekāpi samānadhvaniprasavaheturanyāpi svarūpeṇaiva jātyantaranirapekṣā /
T11bsa0551u:224: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ /
T11bsa0551u:226: aśvatvagotvā dīnāṃ sāmānya viśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyam;
T11bsa0551u:231: iheti buddheḥ samavāyasiddhiriheti dhīśca dvayadarśane syāt /
T11bsa0551u:233: etena yeyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīsu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyuhāpravarttanamasya pratyākhyātam /
T11bsa0551u:240: tasmāt, tulya bhede yayā jā tiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
T11bsa0551u:243: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu kiṃ daṇḍasūtrādineti /
T11bsa0551u:247: tadyadīdaṃ parikalpanīyam tadā varam pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
T11bsa0551u:265: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimā n piṇḍa iti parikalpitam bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādgovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya /
T11bsa0551u:272: tatra na budhyākārasya tattvataḥ sambṛttyā vā vidhiniṣedhau /
T11bsa0551u:275: nāpi tattvato vāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau tasya śābde pratyaye 'pratibhāsanāt /
T11bsa0551u:276: ataeva sarvvadharmmāṇāntattvato 'nabhilāpyatvaṃ pratibhāsādhyavasāyābhāvāt tasmāt vāhyasyaiva sāmbṛtau vidhiniṣedhau /
T11bsa0551u:279: vahireva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ //
T11bsa0551u:283: nanvadhyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko 'rthaḥ?
T11bsa0551u:286: ucyate; yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā niyataśaktitvāt niyatā eva jalādau pravṛttiḥ /
T11bsa0551u:291: yenākāre vāhyasya vāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:292: kintarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buḍvirapaśyantyapi vāhyaṃ vāhye vṛttimātano tīti viplutaiva /
T11bsa0551u:294: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam //
T11bsa0551u:312: viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānam vācakatvamadhyavasitavāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
T11bsa0551u:314: arthaścaiko 'dhyāsato bhāsato 'nyaḥ sthāpyo vācyastattvato naiva kaścit //
T11bsa0551u:318: tatrādṛḍhe sarvvamayatnaśīrṇaṃ dṛḍhe tu sausthyannanu tāvataiva //
